author: stefan2
msg: (write_config): make the defaults in the settings file match our internal defaults

author: stsp
msg: Make the interactive merge tool side-by-side display use the full terminal
width on platforms that support either getenv("COLUMNS") or the TIOCGWINSZ
ioctl() call. For other platforms the width remains hardcoded to 80 columns.
(): Include <sys/iotctl.h> if APR indicates platform support for this header.
(get_term_width): New helper function to determine the terminal width.
(LINE_DISPLAY_WIDTH): Redefine as a function of get_term_width().
the result in a local variable.
(get_sep_string): ... this new helper function which creates the separator
string with a length based on terminal width.
